head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HARM, MARY GAY.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HARM, MARY GAY.

block.p: HARM-Mary Gay. On June 5, 2000 at age 77. Dedicated social worker. Wife of the late Carl S. Harm. Sister of the late Inez Gay Johnson. Aunt to Marcia Johnson Alston, Gay Johnson McDougall and John A. Payton. Also survived by many loving cousins and other family members. Funeral services will be held Saturday, June 10 at 1:30PM at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81 Street.

Payton. Also survived by many loving cousins and other family members. Funeral services will be held Saturday, June 10 at 1:30PM at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81 Street.
